item.description:
Elaine, who runs the Dynamic Introductions - Merrimack Valley Region, NH & MA meetup group, is running this event, so you should address any additional questions about how this is run, including the cost for the speed dating portion, to her, but I will be in attendance as a further contact person for you at the event.

The description, below, of the event is from her meetup listing.

Â 

Speed Dating, with expanded age ranges, and an "CUPID PARTY" to follow.


Please register on line PRIOR to event to hold your spot for Speed Dating at www.8MinuteDating.com

All speed dating participants attend the after party for FREE.

Speed Dating starts at 6 pm, after Party for ALL AGES at 8 pm following the event.


$10 cover for CUPID PARTY includes free appetizers, door prizes, and a chance to meet someone special just before Valentines Day! Hosted by Dynamic Introductions & 8MinuteDating.com, profits to organizer goes to a great cause.....see www.MotivatingMiles.org for details of their wonderful cause to benefit terminally ill New Hampshire residents.

If you need or would like further information, please call Elaine at 603-262-1560
item.how_to_find_us: Ask where the speed-dating event is being held.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Speed Dating with CUPID Party after event
